translations: 着色；色彩；抛光；倾向性；外貌
把……涂颜色；变色（colour 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Other countries vary the colouring of their bank notes as well as their size.
sentences.translation: 其他各国钞票的色彩和大小各异。
蓝色适合于她白皙的肤色。

sentences.sentence: The gold colouring had begun to rub off.
sentences.translation: 金黄色已经开始剥落了。
